descriptionHTML:
The new Sauer Diver generation represents another step in the further technological evolution of Smart Watches. This process of continuous improvement and development is a prime example of what is probably Darwin’s best-known quotation: “It is not the strongest of the species that survives, nor the most intelligent that survives. It is the one that is the most adaptable to change.”

We make smartwatches that looks like real watches, but smarter!

Highlights
★ TAP to add/remove bezel.
★ Looks so REAL, not like cartoons.
★ High Quality Design and Shadows
★ Day of the Week
★ Day of the Month
★ Amazing DIM mode for Ambient ,lume like a real watch
★ Optimized! Native Super Power Saving to Last longer!

Installation
After install, the watch will be sent automatically to the watch. It may take a minute.
Support round faces.
Moto 360, LG, huawei

Feel free to contact us. before rating.
comments: Wont download to watch and doesnt appear in my apps on phone unless I search app manager. Bought it twice now and still doesnt work.
Great watch face !!! Looks great on watch, I wish there was a little more customization for colors and tap feature but overall great !! Thanks
Looks Great Straightforward but great looking on my Huawei.  Less is more.

Absolutely gorgeous face.  The detail and clarity of the visual elements is incredible, and the expert use of shadow effects really lends a powerful sense of depth to this face. This is one of the more realistic faces I've encountered, and I've tried a lot. The dev is also very responsive to feedback and was very quick to implement a toggle for the bezel at my request. Thanks!
Looks fairly good on the urbane... I don't know if it's an optical illusion or a problem, but the watch face looks slightly off-kilter on the LG urbane.
